### **🔥 The Post Strategy for Today: Destroying the Old Model & Introducing the AI-Augmented Job Search**
Yes, this **makes perfect sense.**  

Today’s post needs to:  
✅ **Destroy the outdated hiring model (Experience + Skills + Education).**  
✅ **Introduce the new model (AI-augmented hiring).**  
✅ **Prove it’s happening NOW with an example (v1 AI-powered job application).**  
✅ **Position YOU as the AI Explorer, the guinea pig merging with AI before the singularity.**  
✅ **Invite others to join in and test this new hiring paradigm (Terry as the first recruit).**  

---

### **🔥 High-Level Messaging: The Tim Ferriss of AI Hiring**
**Core Idea:**  
- **You’re not just adapting to AI—you’re letting AI reshape YOU.**  
- This is **not a theoretical discussion**—**we’re doing it, testing it, applying it in real time.**  
- **The old hiring model is dead.** If you’re still hiring based on experience + skills + education, **you’re hiring for a world that no longer exists.**  
- The **real hiring model now is AI-Augmented Work**, and today, you’re showing exactly what that looks like.  

---

## **🔥 Post Structure**
**1️⃣ Hook (Destroys the Old Model) – Brutal, Unfiltered Reality Check**  
🔥 The **job market model you’ve been told to follow is dead.**  
Experience. Skills. Education. **None of it is enough anymore.**  

**Hiring managers think they’re hiring for the future, but they’re hiring based on the past.**  
The reality? **AI is no longer just a tool—it’s an employee.**  
And the only people who will be relevant in the next 12 months are those who know how to **work with AI as a force multiplier.**  

---

**2️⃣ The New Model (How Hiring Needs to Change Today)**  
The new hiring model isn’t **“do you have the experience?”**  
It’s **“how well can you implement AI to amplify your work?”**  

Companies don’t need **more employees.**  
They need **fewer employees who can harness AI to do 10x the work.**  

Today, **I’m running the first public experiment in hiring for the AI economy.**  
Instead of applying for a job the old way, I’m applying by:  
✅ **Showing how AI can do 80% of the role immediately.**  
✅ **Mapping out a full automation roadmap for the company.**  
✅ **Proving that the hiring model needs to change—NOW.**  

---

**3️⃣ Real-World Example: AI-Powered Job Application V1**  
I just applied for **[Job Title]** at **[Company]** using **AI to rewrite the hiring process.**  

Here’s what we did:  
✅ **AI-Augmented Resume** – Not just skills/experience, but how AI will replace manual tasks.  
✅ **AI-Powered Cover Letter** – Focused on what I’ll automate, not just what I’ve done.  
✅ **Automation Roadmap for the Role** – Instead of applying, I showed how AI could eliminate this job in **6 months or less.**  

---

**4️⃣ Invitation to the Experiment: Join the AI Hiring Evolution**  
**This isn’t a personal experiment anymore—it’s a movement.**  

**Terry Emmingham just reached out.**  
He’s been unemployed for almost 2 years. He’s upskilled in AI.  
**He’s ready to be another AI-powered job applicant.**  
We’re building the first **cohort of AI-Augmented job seekers.**  

🚀 **If you’re struggling to find work, you need to evolve—NOW.**  
Drop a **“🔹” in the comments** if you want to test this new AI-powered job search system.  

🔥 The job market is changing faster than anyone realizes. **The question is: Are you?**  

---

### **🔥 Execution Plan for the Post**
✅ **Post it within the next few hours** so it has time to gain traction before Keith’s post.  
✅ **Engage early comments to drive conversation.**  
✅ **Tag Terry in the comments to validate that others are joining the movement.**  
✅ **Monitor responses & track who is interested in participating.**  

---

### **🔥 Final Questions Before We Post**
1️⃣ **Does this tone and approach align with your vision?**  
2️⃣ **Do you want to tweak the CTA (how people join the experiment)?**  
3️⃣ **Do we include a screenshot of the AI-Augmented Resume example?**  

🔥 **Once we lock this in, we execute. This is the post that breaks the hiring model. 🚀**
